title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Call to action - petition White House for approval of licensing of self-sufficient clean energy generators such as... <!--more--> those using cold fusion - with Bahram Maskanian Bahram Maskanian is the founder and CEO of the Venus Project Foundation in New York City that is dedicated to the promotion of clean energy technologies to reduce the carbon footprint and replace fossil fuel based energy sources.
The Foundation has petitioned the White House with New Energy Technology strategy that would include cold fusion power generators, completely self-sustaining and available for homes.
Until now these new clean technologies have not been available to the public.
The foundation is seeking 100,00 signatures by May 31 to meet the goal set by the White House.
There website is www.VenusProject.org
